markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Derring-Do](/Feats.aspx?ID=1544) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 91 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

When you compound panache with even more derring-do, it somehow tends to work out. When you already have panache, you can roll twice and use the higher result on checks to which the circumstance bonus for having panache applies ([Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) and any skill actions listed in your swashbuckler's style).
name: Derring-Do
